com.redhat.rhn.common.hibernate

Class EmptyVarcharInterceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • EmptyInterceptor
      • com.redhat.rhn.common.hibernate.EmptyVarcharInterceptor

  • public class EmptyVarcharInterceptor
extends EmptyInterceptor
    Hibernate interceptor that searches all objects being saved and checks if all varchar fields are not empty. It can either print a warning in the log or convert empty varchar to null automatically. It depends on the setting of the interceptor.
